questions.text: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
questions.hint: It's also a common terminal command.

questions.text: I have keys but no locks. I have a space but no room. You can enter, but never go outside. What am I?
questions.hint: You are using one right now.

questions.text: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
questions.hint: Think about walking through a digital forest.

questions.text: What acts like a cat but looks like a worm?
I am a portal to the machine soul. I listen on port 22.

final_message: SYSTEM ACCESS GRANTED. THE EGG IS LOCATED AT: /tmp/egg_39281.dat
